summary: SkyTunes brings you new kinds of music from rainingXsalami.
descriptionHtml:
--------------
[URL=http://imgur.com/171BG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/171BG.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
--------------
This mod is the second sound I\'ve made, the other one is called RXS
Sound Mod. SkyTunes is a mix is RXS Sound Mod and itself. This mod
changes....
1. Main Menu Music
2. Combat Music
3. Exploring Music (Eg. Out in the Wilds)
4. Town Music (Music in Towns)
5. Dungeon Music
6. Lute Music (When the bard plays the lute in an inn)

------
Music
------
Main Menu Music 
1.E.S Posthumus - Arise

Combat Music
1. Archangel-Two Steps From Hell
2. Burning Sky-Epic Music
3. Otherworld-Two Steps From Hell
4. Arisen-Killer Tracks
5. All Time Best Heroic Song-Unknown

Exploring Music
1. Oblivion Explore Music 3-Bethesda
2. Minecraft Theme Music 2 OST-Mojang
3. Moonlight-Brian Crain
4. Liberty-Hans Zimmer

Town Music
*Same as above, I think. Sorry for the any problems caused, sound tracks
are hard to keep track of.

Dungeon Music
1. Suspense Music Eerie-Unknown
2. Slow Down-Paul Collier

Lute/Bard Music
1. While My Guitar Gently Weeps-Sungha Jun Ukulele/Beatles
2. Pachelbel\'s Canon Ukulele-Ukulele at it\'s Dorkiest
3. Pirates of the Carribean Movie Theme-Sungha Jun Ukulele

-------
INSTALL
-------
For NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) Users
1. Click on \"Download with Manager\"
2. Click on Mods
3. Install

For Manual Installers
1. Download \"SkyTunes.rar\"
2. Open up your Data folder
3. Copy the Music folder into the Data folder
4. Enjoy.
author: rainingXsalami
